metadata.title: Teaser Episode
metadata.subtitle: A casual talk on AI and LLMs. How are they helpful and how are they going to become a problem. What can possibly happen.
metadata.author: Hari, Krushi, Vishal and George
metadata.content: Hari, Krushi and Vishal with our guest George talk about AI and LLMs
metadata.keywords: tech, code, ai, llms, uses, dangers, ai governance, ai capabilities, pros and cons, jobs, future

pageProps.content:
Topics Discussed

  • AI and LLMs in general
  • How are they helpful and how are they going to become a problem
  • Do we need to be worried about AI and LLMs
  • What can possibly happen
  • Does AI need to be regulated and governed
  • What are the pros and cons of AI and LLMs
  • Is AI going to take away jobs?
